paper_abstract: Dejean conjectured that the repetition threshold for a k-letter alphabet is k/k-1 when k >= 5. Dejean's conjecture has already been proved for k <= 14 and for k >= 27. We present here a proof for 8 <= k <= 38. The same technique is also applied to prove Ochem's stronger version of the conjecture for 9 <= k <= 38. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
